Package group2.monopoly.auth.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
group2.monopoly.auth.service.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
Service class for user authentication related tasks.

  • Method Details

    • passwordMatches

      public boolean passwordMatches(org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, String password)
      Checks supplied raw password.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - User the password is being checked against
      password - Raw password
      Returns:
      true if raw password matches the user's encoded password after encoding

    • passwordMatches

      public boolean passwordMatches(User user, String password)
      Checks supplied raw password.
      Parameters:
      user - user object
      password - raw password
      Returns:
      true if the user's password field is the encoded form of the raw password.
      See Also:
      • passwordMatches(UserDetails, String)

    • promoteToUser

      public User promoteToUser(org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails)
      Promotes UserDetails object to a User.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - user details object
      Returns:
      user object with matching username

      authentication - jwt authentication object
      Returns:
      currently authenticated user

    • createUser

      public io.vavr.control.Either<String,User> createUser(@NotNull @NotNull SignUpDto signUpDto)
      Creates a new user from the DTO object. Role of the User is hardcoded to "USER".
      Parameters:
      signUpDto - DTO object used for creating the user
      Returns:
      Either the newly created user or the error message
      See Also:
      • createUser(String, String, String)

    • createUser

      public io.vavr.control.Either<String,User> createUser(String username, String email, String password)
      Creates a user from given arguments. The User role is hardcoded to "USER"
      Parameters:
      username - username
      email - email
      password - unhashed password
      Returns:
      Either the newly created user or the error message
      See Also:
      • createUser(SignUpDto)

    • createSuperUser

      public io.vavr.control.Either<String,User> createSuperUser(String username, String email, String password)
      Creates a superuser from given arguments. The User role is hardcoded to "ADMIN" and "USER".

      This method is not meant to be used by an endpoint.
      Parameters:
      username - username
      email - email
      password - unhashed password
      Returns:
      Either the newly created user or the error message
      See Also:
      • createUser(String, String, String)

    • updateUser

      public io.vavr.control.Either<String,User> updateUser(@NonNull @NonNull User user, UserSettingsChangeDTO dto)
      Given a user and user settings dto, updates the user settings.

      Non-null fields of dto are attempted to be applied to user's fields. For username and email fields to change, they should not conflict with the existing user's usernames an emails.
      Parameters:
      user - User object that will be updated
      dto - UserSettingsChangeDTO object for updating user settings
      Returns:
      Either the updated user or the reason for failure to do so
      See Also:
      • updateUsername(User, String)
      • updateEmail(User, String)
